org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class TooltipModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.GenericJavaScriptObject
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseItem
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.TooltipModel

  • public final class TooltipModel
extends BaseItem
    This object is passed by CHART.JS to the callback to manage tooltip custom callback.
    The tooltip label configuration is nested below the tooltip configuration using the callbacks key. The tooltip has the following callbacks for providing text.
    All methods must return either a string or an array of strings. Arrays of strings are treated as multiple lines of text.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
    See Also:
    TooltipCustomCallback
